title: Syncovery 7.94a – Back-up and synchronize your Mac
content: Syncovery is used to back-up your data and synchronize Macs, servers, notebooks, and online storage space.   You can set up as many different jobs as you need and run them manually or using the scheduler. The software comes with support for FTP, WebDAV, Amazon S3, and AES file encryption, as well as SSH and […]

title: PhotoZoom Pro 7.1.0 – Enlarge digital images while preserving quality
content: PhotoZoom Pro not only creates larger images than any other software (up to 1 million by 1 million pixels), it also produces higher quality results. PhotoZoom Pro is equipped with S-Spline Max, a unique, patented image-resize technology, which excels at preserving clean edges, sharpness, and fine details.   Even noisy, compressed originals can be enlarged […]

title: Hardware Monitor 5.54 – Hardware monitoring sensor app
content: Hardware Monitor is an application to read out all available hardware sensors in Mac computers. The program can display and visualize measured values in a large variety of fashions. It can also store and export readings. The application Temperature Monitor is available for free, but is limited to accessing temperature sensors only. The application Hardware […]

title: Android Data Recovery 5.1.0.0 – Recover lost data from Android devices
content: Android Data Recovery is designed to deal with a range of data loss situations happened to your Android smartphone/tablet. Such as mistaken deletion, water damage, improper operation, system corruption, virus attack, factory settings restore, rooting, software update and so forth.   As a professional data recovery tool, Android Data Recovery for Mac works well to […]

title: QuizMaker Pro 2018.1.0 – Create custom classroom quizzes
content: QuizMaker Pro is a full-featured assessment application which generates, administers, archives, and scores tests and quizzes with up to 10 different types of questions. The test administrator can attach multiple graphics and/or sounds to each question. Each question can be assigned to a user created category with test results viewed by individual, class, and category. […]

title: New IRC Live Chat Client 1.1 – IRC chat client
content: New IRC Live Chat Client connects you to IRC, a way of communicating in real-time with people from all over the world. title: CDRConverter 1.0.1 – Batch Converter
